as time passed it is reported that

in june of 2006 shelley completely

on november 18 1995
lisa mcpherson a member of scientology
since the age of 18 was involved in a
minor car accident
after the accident she got out of the
car and took all her clothes off
she was taken to the hospital where they
determined that she was physically okay
but they wanted her to stay so they
could psychologically evaluate her
members of scientology refused to let
macpherson stay as the church doesn't
believe in psychiatry
instead they wanted to treat her
themselves
the church tried to treat mcpherson with
what is called an introspection rundown
this is a process that the church uses
to cure members who are having a mental
breakdown
the idea is that if you can identify the
cause of the breakdown they can snap the
individual out of it
this process involves isolating the
individual and subjecting them to
auditing sessions where they attempt to
find the cause of the psychotic break
mcpherson was kept at the flag land base
presumably against her will for more
than two weeks to be treated
you can read the logs of her treatment
during this time
her mental state had deteriorated to the
point where she was becoming violent
bruising her fists by hitting them
against the walls refusing to eat and
sleep and even becoming completely
unresponsive some days
scientologists who questioned this or
wanted to bring her to a hospital we're
told to leave it alone
eventually they had no choice but to
bring her to a hospital
when they arrived macpherson was
emaciated dehydrated and covered in
insect bites
she was beyond saving and died that
night
the church was indicted on two felony
charges of abuse of a disabled adult and
practicing medicine without a license
unfortunately these charges were dropped
after the state's medical examiner
changed the cause of death from
undetermined to accidental
